name: Pastel Color Twitter
description: Simply make twitter pastel colored. Twitter default blue goes gray:p Special thanks to SchemeColor.com. How to change color 1. Click "More (...)" button on left side of the twitter.com on browser 2. Click "Display" (would be the bottom of the popup menu) will open control panel üç∫üç∫üç∫ If you like this, you can buy us a beer! üç∫üç∫üç∫ if you love pink -> Pastel Color Twitter Pink Add on | Userstyles.org If you are looking for custom color userstyles -> Custom Color Twitter ‚Äî UserStyles.world Try our other userstyles for Twitter works with it perfectly - Twitter RT Button Outlined - Fast Twitter 2020
additional_info:
2022/4/23 follow Twitter uses inline colors in some situation
2021/8/31 follow Twitter changed almost all colors. this style works again.
2021/8/13 follow Twitter changed "few" on some borders and background color (https://twitter.com/TwitterDesign/status/1425505308563099650)
2021/7/31 follow changes to recover default background color on hover
2021/4/4 fix some shadow removed
2020/10/24 fix font size bar. speed up (kill) menu animation. mod loading wheel, setting tabs, menu
2020/7/17 fix lost highlight for default mode
2020/7/16 add highlight for dim & dark mode
2020/7/11 fix emoji is hidden on dim & dark mode
2020/7/5 fix pink hovered twitter button (we are very sorry for that!), remove shadows, change default light gray liked color
2020/6/14 add support for all colors
2020/6/13 initial release supports Pink & Purple.
